column4: I need the Genius MousePen 8x6 to get the pen working, and pressure features don't do a thing.
hello? I need help on my Genius MousePen 8x6.
you need to configure the drivers and then configure your device in /etc/X11/xorg.conf
search for the right drivers, install these, the take a look at xorg.conf and insert there your new input device
